page.title: 04POPULATION
page.content: Being largely rural,it is perhaps not suprising to find that most people have lived in the area all of their lives.We have found however that a number of people had moved within the area.A small number of council houses in Whalehill contain tenants re_housed as a result of a nearby slum clearance programme.Of people interviewed most described themselves as working class but in some cases showed certain attributes of a middle class person, for example owning a microwave oven or a video.The vast majority of people living in Wilton,Lackenby and Kirkleatham were old and retired.Even in Lazenby where there were a number of large families with young children there were still a third of the population either retired or nearing retirement.In general the population of this area is decreasing.
